items.title: File Integrity Monitoring (BETA)
items.description: Reflex now supports adding File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) rules to your organization. FIM rules allow you to monitor for changes to files on your endpoints. For more information, see [File Integrity Monitoring](https://docs.reflexsoart.com/file-integrity-monitoring).  Note: This is a Beta feature and requires a special agent.

items.title: Agents
items.description: - Agents will now be flagged as `is_pluggable` if they are running the new pluggable agent.  This is for backwards compatibility purposes.
